files.README.md:
Custom Agent Skills for Claude Code.

## Installation

### Marketplace

```
/plugin marketplace add bborysenko/skills
/plugin install nullstone@bborysenko-skills
```

### Manual

Add the contents of this repo to a `/.claude` folder in the root of your project. See more in the [official Claude Code documentation](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/agents-and-tools/claude-code/skills).

## Skills

### Nullstone

Deploy and manage applications on AWS and GCP with Nullstone:

- Nullstone CLI commands (`deploy`, `push`, `launch`, `logs`, `exec`, `ssh`)
- Kubernetes deployments (EKS on AWS, GKE on GCP)
- Container services (ECS on AWS)
- Preview environments for testing
- Environment variables and secrets management
- Cloud infrastructure setup with Terraform
